price: 169. solo (los guiará) hacia el camino que conduce al Infierno, donde permanecerán eternamente; y ello es fácil para Al-lah.
arabic: إِلَّا طَرِيقَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۚ وَكَانَ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: illā ṭarīqa jahannama khālidīna fīhā abadan wakāna dhālika ʿalā al-lahi yasīran
